Package org.forgerock.openidm.maintenance.upgrade

Interface UpdateManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
UpdateManagerImpl
public interface UpdateManager
Update manager interface

  • Method Details

    • report

      org.forgerock.json.JsonValue report(Path archiveFile, Path installDir) throws UpdateException
      Provide a report of which files have been changed since they were installed.
      Parameters:
      archiveFile - the Path to a ZIP archive containing a new version of OpenIDM
      installDir - the base directory where OpenIDM is installed
      Returns:
      a json response listed changed files by state
      Throws:
      UpdateException

    • diff

      org.forgerock.json.JsonValue diff(Path archiveFile, Path installDir, String filename) throws UpdateException
      Return the diff of a single file to show what changes will be made if we overwrite the existing file.
      Parameters:
      archiveFile - the Path to a ZIP archive containing a new version of OpenIDM
      installDir - the base directory where OpenIDM is installed
      filename - the file to diff
      Returns:
      a json response showing the current file, the new file, and the diff
      Throws:
      UpdateException - on failure to perform diff

    • upgrade

      org.forgerock.json.JsonValue upgrade(Path archiveFile, Path installDir, String userName) throws UpdateException
      Perform the upgrade.
      Parameters:
      archiveFile - the Path to a ZIP archive containing a new version of OpenIDM
      installDir - the base directory where OpenIDM is installed
      userName - the name of the user who initiated the update install
      Returns:
      a json response with the report of what was done to each file
      Throws:
      UpdateException - on failure to perform upgrade

    • completeRepoUpdates

      org.forgerock.json.JsonValue completeRepoUpdates(String updateId) throws UpdateException
      Mark repo updates for a given update as having been performed.
      Parameters:
      updateId - The id of the update log entry to complete
      Returns:
      a json response containing the updated log entry
      Throws:
      UpdateException

    • listAvailableUpdates

      org.forgerock.json.JsonValue listAvailableUpdates() throws UpdateException
      List the applicable update archives found in the update directory.
      Returns:
      a json list of objects describing each applicable update archive.
      Throws:
      UpdateException - on failure to generate archive list.

    • listRepoUpdates

      org.forgerock.json.JsonValue listRepoUpdates(Path archiveFile) throws UpdateException
      List repo updates present in a given archive or the currently pending update
      Parameters:
      archiveFile - The archive file to list repo updates for or null to use the the currently pending update
      Returns:
      A json list of objects representing each repo update
      Throws:
      UpdateException - on failure to generate repo update list

    • getLicense

      org.forgerock.json.JsonValue getLicense(Path archive) throws UpdateException
      Return the license for a given update archive. Defaults to the license found in the current OpenIDM deployment if the archive does not contain a license file.
      Parameters:
      archive - Path to the archive to search for a license file.
      Returns:
      json object containing the license.
      Throws:
      UpdateException - on failure to provide a license.

    • getArchiveFile

      org.forgerock.json.JsonValue getArchiveFile(Path archive, Path file) throws UpdateException
      Get the contents of an archive file as a string
      Parameters:
      archive -
      file -
      Returns:
      JsonValue
      Throws:
      UpdateException

    • restartNow

      void restartNow()
      Restart IDM now, interrupting a sleeping UpdateThread if it exists

    • getLastUpdateId

      String getLastUpdateId()
      Return the id of the most recently installed update, default to "0".
      Returns:
      string representing the most recent update id
